DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are conducting a randomized trial of behavioral treatments for young children with insomnia. The investigators are comparing the improvement in sleep patterns after families are given access to Internet sleep instructions compared to DVD sleep instructions.
DOC.criteria: 636 months difficulties falling asleep or staying asleep DVD and internet access Under 14 pounds Requires nighttime feeding or parental intervention for health reasons Chronic medical or psychological conditions such as asthma or autism Parents prefer cosleeping
